trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [number of dots v] to [1] say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to [2] say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to [4] say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to [8] say (number of dots) for (1) secs set [number of dots v] to [16] say (number of dots) for (1) secs
